mapper.select: select * from road_stage where roadId=1 order by sort

select ABS(#{x}-backX) toX,ABS(#{y}-backY) toY,round(SQRT(ABS(#{x}-backX)*ABS(#{x}-backX)+ABS(#{y}-backY)*ABS(#{y}-backY)),2) distance,backX,backY,roadId,frontThrough,backThrough from road_stage rs where 1=1 order by distance limit 0,1
